mapper.select: select title as "title" ,start_date as "start" ,end_date as "end" from tbl_calendar
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_calendar(title, start_date, end_date) values(#{title},#{start},#{end})

select reply_seq.nextval from dual
insert into tbl_reply (reply_no, reply, replyer, board_no) values(#{replyNo}, #{reply}, #{replyer}, #{boardNo})
mapper.select: select count(1) from tbl_reply where board_no = #{boardNo}
select reply_no ,reply ,replyer ,reply_date , from tbl_reply where reply_no =#{replyNo}

select tbl_a.* from (select /*+INDEX_DESC (r pk_reply) */ rownum rn, reply_no, reply, replyer, board_no,reply_date from tbl_reply r where board_no= #{boardNo}) tbl_a where tbl_a.rn >=(#{page} - 1 ) *5
and tbl_a.rn <= #{page} *5
